theory.cross_section module

cross_section.py

Formula for the Breit Wheeler cross-section taken from BKettle et al. A laser-plasma platform for photon-photon physics. 2018. New J. Phys 23 115006 Section 8

Plot_formulae function is to compare with the plots generated by Cary Colgan in his PhD thesis.

Timothy Chew 1/8/25

theory.cross_section.dc_bw(root_s: list, theta: list) → list[source]

Breit Wheeler differential cross section We get invalid values into the square root sometimes Supposed to set the value of d_cs to 0 But lazy to handle the meshgrid array

Args:

root_s (np.ndarray[float]): centre of mass energy theta (np.ndarray[float]): Collision and scattering angle

Returns:

np.ndarray[float]: differential Briet Wheeler cross section (barns)

theory.values module

values.py

Stores values of common scientific constants. Stores values of measurements, estimations, and experimental setup parameters taken from the 2018 experiment.
